title: White House Nearing Deadline for Fiscal Stimulus
itunes:title: White House Nearing Deadline for Fiscal Stimulus
description:
Dr. William Haseltine, Chair and President of Access Health International, provides a coronavirus and vaccine update. Bloomberg News U.S. Health Care Reporter Cynthia Koons walks through the story “Covid Plus Decades of Pollution Are a Nasty Combo for Detroit.” Bloomberg News Congressional Reporter Erik Wasson talks about the White House nearing its goal of having a fiscal stimulus deal in 48 hours. And we Drive to the Close with Barry James, Portfolio Manager with James Investment Research.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Paul Sweeney. Producer: Doni Holloway. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
